results.title: Next generation
results.brief_description: As the daughter of migrant parents Nella often felt “different and isolated from the other children at school”. Her strict father did not allow her to experience some of the advantages life in Australia had to offer so Nella was determined that her own daughter would have what she couldn’t. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).

results.title: Life and learning
results.brief_description: Tim Kanoa expresses his culture through dance. He is proud of his Aboriginality and has been living and learning from the day he was born. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Morehu
results.brief_description: Rita Morrison’s mother died three days after the 9/11 terrorist attacks. Her grief would link these two events forever. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: My wardrobe door
results.brief_description: Nadia Rose’s wardrobe door is full of photo’s of her friends and family. It keeps them close to her even when she is far away. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Old and new
results.brief_description: In her house Karen Adams is surrounded by old and new things. Objects that she finds in op shops and on the beach. Things that remind her of home. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie heritage Trust.

results.title: Journeys
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Sheiny New and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sheiny New first came to Australia from America on a special scholarship program. While here she met her future husband and never looked back. She has since become a passionate campaigner speaking out against domestic violence in the Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
